name: Patagonia
summary: The text does not explicitly mention Patagonia's ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) commitments. However, it highlights some of their initiatives and values, such as prioritizing purpose over profit, protecting the planet, offering web specials on past-season products, and implementing a product safety recall for infant clothing. The company also supports activism, donates 1% of its sales to environmental causes, and promotes sustainable practices through its Worn Wear program. The text also discusses different types of cookies used on a website and their purposes, as well as how users can manage their consent preferences for these cookies.
